title._content: Image taken from page 295 of 'Babylon Electrified. The history of an expedition undertaken to restore ancient Babylon by the power of electricity, and how it resulted ... Translated ... by Frank Linstow White. Illustrated by Montader'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Babylon Electrified. The history of an expedition undertaken to restore ancient Babylon by the power of electricity, and how it resulted ... Translated ... by Frank Linstow White. Illustrated by Montader" Author: BLEUNARD, Albert. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 012632.k.29." Page: 295 Place of Publishing: London; Philadelphia [printed] Date of Publishing: 1890 Publisher: Chapman & Hall Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000376251 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
